metadata.Title: CVE-2021-3480 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in slapi-nis in versions before 0.56.7. A NULL pointer dereference during the parsing of the Binding DN could allow an unauthenticated attacker to crash the 389-ds-base directory server. The highest threat from this vulnerability is to system availability.

criterions.comment: slapi-nis: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
